products.productName: Sheesham Wood Queen Size Bed With Side Storage (Walnut Finish)
products.productDesc:
Transform your bedroom into a stylish and functional haven with this exquisite Sheesham Wood Queen Size Bed. Crafted from premium Sheesham wood, renowned for its durability and natural beauty, this bed is built to last for years. The rich walnut finish enhances the grain of the wood, giving it a warm, sophisticated look that complements both modern and traditional interiors.

Designed for maximum comfort, this queen-size bed provides ample space for a restful night’s sleep. But what sets it apart is the added functionality of side storage. The cleverly integrated storage compartments on both sides of the bed offer convenient space for bedding, clothes, or other personal items, helping you keep your bedroom neat and organized.

With its sturdy construction, timeless appeal, and practical design, this Sheesham Wood Queen Size Bed is more than just a piece of furniture—it’s an investment in your home’s comfort and aesthetic. Whether you're looking for a cozy retreat or a stylish focal point for your bedroom, this bed is sure to impress.

products.productName: Walken Sheesham Wood Bed with Full Drawer Storage (Queen Size, Walnut Finish)
products.productDesc:
1. Walken bed with storage is very convenient furniture to invite in the bedroom. Firstly, it is contemporary furniture design. Secondly, the backrest has two drop-down drawers, and each of those has an upholstered panel for more comfort. Thirdly, headboard and drawer storage provide spacious places to store more.

2. Sheesham wood crafting of the bed makes it very durable.

​3. Along with it, honey and walnut finish options increase the variety to pick from.

products.productName: Bacon Bed With Box Storage (Queen Size, Walnut Finish)
products.productDesc:
1. Bacon bed with box storage is celebrating contemporary furniture design. It consists of a horizontal slot on the backrest which is distinct and noticeable. This bed is equipped with a box storage which is divided into four partitions from top to keep all your extra items.

2. This queen size bed is crafted from the finest quality of Sheesham to ensure durability and sturdiness.

3. To maintain the shine, it is available in different finish options viz., Honey and Walnut.

products.productName: Upholstered Bed Without Storage (Queen Size, Indigo Blue)
products.productDesc:
1. This is an elegant furniture design with sleek bed and upholstery in beautiful colors. It has subtle vertical legs and standard height and the upholstery is in tufted pattern.

2. The upholstery is made in velvet and the bed is in sheesham wood.

​3. There are variety of fabric options available for the upholstery.

2. The upholstery is made in velvet and the bed is in sheesham wood.

products.productName: Sheesham Wood Bed With Box Storage (King Size, Honey Finish)
products.productDesc:
About Material & Finish

The Brixton Sheesham Wood Bed is crafted from premium-quality Sheesham wood, known for its durability & robustness. The wood exhibits a dense grain pattern, giving it an exquisite natural look. The premium finish enhances this intrinsic beauty, adding depth and a touch of classic sophistication to the bed's appearance.

Manufacturing Details & Stringent Quality Checks

Each bed undergoes a meticulous manufacturing process, where seasoned craftsmen employ traditional woodworking techniques combined with modern machinery for precision. Post-manufacturing, the bed is subjected to multiple quality checks, ensuring that every piece meets our high standards of perfection and is free from any defects.

Product Features

This bed offers spacious sleeping area, ideal for master bedrooms. Its efficiently designed storage space is perfect to declutter and organize essentials. The unique design of this bed merges well with various interior aesthetics. The grid pattern at the headboard and footboard are the signature design details of this bed.

 Procuring Wood:

Environmentally conscious, we procure wood only from sustainable forests, which are seasoned in company-owned seasoning chambers.

About Termite Resistant:

Every single piece of wood is treated with industry-specific techniques, making it termite-resistant and ensuring its safe.

products.productName: Premium Sheesham Wood Bed with Cushioned Headboard and Drawer Storage (King Size, Teak Finish)
products.productDesc:
Solid Sheesham Wood Construction:

Crafted from premium Sheesham wood, known for its strength, resistance to decay, and beautiful natural grain

Offers structural integrity and timeless appeal

Elegant Teak Finish:

Enhances the natural patterns of the wood

Adds a touch of luxury and a warm, earthy vibe to the room

Spacious Drawer Storage:

4 side drawers (2 on each side), ideal for storing bedding, pillows, clothes, and more

Smooth, handle-less design keeps the aesthetics clean and contemporary

Saves wardrobe space and helps in maintaining a clutter-free bedroom

Multi-functional Headboard:

Unique built-in shelf space for books, decor, or nighttime essentials

Padded fabric upholstery panels on the headboard for added comfort during sitting or lounging

Combines utility with a cozy, soft-touch finish

King Size Dimensions:

Spacious enough for couples, families with kids, or those who love extra space

Compatible with all standard king size mattresses

Contemporary Design Aesthetic:

Clean lines, no visible hardware, and minimalistic styling for a sleek, modern bedroom look

Rich texture and tones make it adaptable to various interior themes—bohemian, rustic, or modern chic

products.productName: Premium Sheesham Wood Bed with Cane & Velvet Headboard, Drawer Storage & 2 Modular Bedside Tables (King Size, Honey Finish)
products.productDesc:
Premium Sheesham Wood Construction: Solid wood frame in honey finish for lasting strength and natural beauty.

Cane & Velvet Headboard: Elegant combination of handwoven cane and plush velvet for comfort and style.

Spacious Drawer Storage: Built-in drawers to keep essentials neatly organized and easily accessible.

Two Modular Bedside Tables: Flexible bedside units for extra storage and convenience.

Sturdy & Durable Frame: Designed for reliable support and long-term use.

Timeless Design: Harmonizes traditional craftsmanship with modern elegance, enhancing any bedroom décor.

products.productName: Sheesham Wood Bed with Hydraulic Storage and Cane Detailing (King Size, Honey Finish)
products.productDesc:
Solid Sheesham Wood Build
Engineered from premium Sheesham wood, ensuring strength, stability, and long-lasting durability.

Natural Honey Finish
Adds warmth and charm to your bedroom with its rich and inviting tone.

Cane Detailing on Headboard & Drawers

Hydraulic Storage Mechanism

Spacious King Size Design

Integrated Headboard Shelf
Functional and stylish shelf built into the headboard—ideal for books, décor, or nighttime necessities.

products.productName: Luxe Fabric Bed with High Rise Headboard & Storage (King Size, Red Upholstery)
products.productDesc:
Elegant Udaipur Collection Design: Inspired by regal aesthetics, the Kesarth Bed blends timeless craftsmanship with modern luxury.

Solid Wood Construction: Built with high-quality wood for exceptional durability, stability, and long-lasting strength.

Upholstered Cushioned Headboard: A plush, printed fabric headboard offers superior comfort while adding artisanal character.

Striking Contrast Upholstery: Features a beautifully printed fabric headboard paired with a complementing red-upholstered footboard for a bold, luxurious look.

Smart Storage Solutions: Integrated storage drawers (or hydraulic lift, if applicable) provide ample space to keep essentials organized.

Premium Finish Options: Available in rich wood tones and finishes that elevate the bed’s sophisticated appeal.

Spacious Sleeping Comfort: Designed in King/Queen sizes to provide generous space and a restful sleep experience.

Luxury Meets Practicality: A perfect combination of style, comfort, and functionality for contemporary bedrooms.

products.productDesc:

products.productName: Single Bed Without Storage (Honey Finish)
products.productDesc:

products.productName: Single Bed Without Storage (Honey Finish)
products.productDesc:

products.productName: Trundle Bed (Honey Finish)
products.productDesc: Have kids at home? Or are you frequently visited by guests who stay over for the night? Then a Kendra Trundle bed is simply awesome for you to have. The concept of a trundle bed is very simple. There is a main bed and underneath it there is another bed which can be simply drawn out for usage when needed. Sounds really convenient, isn't it? A Kendra trundle bed is crafted from the finest Sheesham wood and hence it is very durable and can be your furniture companion for years to come. The honey finish adds to its special charm.

products.productName: Box Storage Single Bed (Frosty White Finish)
products.productDesc:
Dust the furniture regularly.
Wipe the wooden surface with a clean microfiber cloth damped in a wood-friendly cleanser. Immediately wipe the moisture with a dry, soft, and lint-free cloth.
In case of a spill, blot the stain with a clean, dry cloth in a gentle manner. Please make sure you do not use coarse material or rub the spot briskly.
Use mats and coasters before keeping any hot or cold items on the wooden surface.
Ensure that the furniture does not have any exposure to moisture and water.
Protect the material from direct sunlight and heat to maintain its original quality.
Keep sharp objects away from your furniture to avoid cuts and scratches.
Avoid chemical and alcohol contact with the furniture as it might harm the natural finish and durability of the product.

products.productName: Single Seater Ash Wood Sofa with Cane Accents (Teak Finish, Butter Cream)
products.productDesc:
Refined One-Seater Sofa for Elegant Interiors
The Varnik One Seater Sofa offers a perfect combination of style, comfort, and timeless craftsmanship. Its compact yet elegant design makes it a great fit for living rooms, reading corners, bedrooms, or formal lounges. Tailored for comfort and aesthetics, it complements both contemporary and classic décor themes.

Crafted in Solid Ash Wood
Built from high-quality Ash wood, known for its fine grain, strength, and resistance to wear.
The teak finish gives the frame a warm golden-brown tone that beautifully highlights the natural wood texture.

Traditional Cane Paneling
The sofa features handwoven cane inserts on the side panels, adding artisanal charm and a breathable, lightweight appeal.
This traditional touch adds character to the design while enhancing its visual depth and openness.

Soft Butter Cream Upholstery
Upholstered in premium-quality Butter Cream fabric that adds a soft, neutral tone, ideal for bright or earthy interiors.
The color exudes calm and warmth, effortlessly blending with a variety of design styles and palettes.

Comfort-Focused Seating Design
Comes with thick, foam-filled seat and back cushions for lasting comfort.
Wide armrests and deep seating provide excellent support for lounging, reading, or casual conversations.

Removable Cushion Covers
Designed with practicality in mind, the cushion covers can be removed and cleaned, helping maintain freshness over time.
Perfect for everyday use in active households.

Versatile and Timeless Look
The combination of teak finish, soft fabric, and natural cane accents makes this piece versatile enough for traditional, mid-century, or modern interior settings.
Can be used as a standalone accent chair or paired with matching pieces for a coordinated set.

Easy Maintenance
Ash wood and cane frame can be cleaned with a soft, dry cloth.
The fabric is easy to spot-clean, and removable covers make deeper cleaning hassle-free.

products.productName: Three Seater Sofa with Cane Accents (Cotton, Jade Ivory)
products.productDesc:
The Samvaad 3 Seater Sofa with Cane Accents (Cotton, Jade Ivory) is a perfect fusion of timeless elegance and modern functionality. Upholstered in soothing Jade Ivory cotton fabric and crafted from solid Sheesham wood, this sofa offers unmatched durability, comfort, and sophistication. With its deep button-tufted backrest, plush seating, and stunning cane detailing, it adds a regal charm to any living room setup.

Highlighted Features
Premium Sheesham Wood Frame: Durable and sturdy base that ensures longevity and strength.

Jade Ivory Cotton Upholstery: Soft, breathable, and elegant fabric ideal for everyday comfort.

Tufted Backrest Design: Deep button-tufting enhances the classic Chesterfield aesthetic.

Cane Panel Accents: Handwoven cane detailing on the sides brings a natural, earthy charm to the design.

Spacious 3-Seater Layout: Offers ample seating space without compromising on comfort or style.

Tapered Wooden Legs: Angled legs for stability and an added touch of mid-century modern flair.

Supportive Cushions: High-density foam cushions ensure lasting comfort and shape retention.

products.productName: Three Seater Ash Wood Sofa with Cane Accents (Teak Finish, Butter Cream)
products.productDesc:
Elegant and Spacious 3-Seater Sofa
The Varnik 3 Seater Sofa is designed to blend timeless elegance with everyday functionality. Ideal for living rooms, lounges, or drawing areas, it offers generous seating space with a minimalist design that brings warmth and sophistication to any interior.

Constructed with Premium Ash Wood
Expertly crafted from high-quality Ash wood, renowned for its strength, fine texture, and resistance to warping.
The teak finish enhances the natural beauty of the grain while adding a warm, golden undertone to the frame.

Handwoven Cane Detailing
Features classic natural cane panels on the armrests and side frames, adding texture and an artisanal character to the sofa.
This lightweight design detail introduces a breathable and visually open element to the structure.

Butter Cream Fabric Upholstery
Upholstered in soothing Butter Cream-colored fabric, this neutral shade offers a light, clean look that softens the bold wooden frame.
The fabric complements a variety of color schemes and brings a calm, airy feel to the space.

Comfort-Driven Seating Experience
Equipped with thick seat and back cushions filled with high-resilience foam for optimal comfort and support.
The wide armrests and deep seat offer ergonomic comfort, making it perfect for long sitting hours with family or guests.

Removable Cushion Covers for Easy Cleaning
Cushion covers are removable and washable, allowing for hassle-free maintenance and lasting freshness.
Designed to withstand daily use while retaining comfort and appearance.

Versatile Aesthetic for Multiple Settings
Whether placed in a modern apartment, traditional living room, or a transitional lounge area, the Varnik 3 Seater adapts seamlessly.
Pairs beautifully with matching one-seater options for a coordinated look or stands strong as a solo centerpiece.

Low Maintenance and Long-Lasting
Ash wood structure requires minimal upkeep — just a wipe with a dry or slightly damp cloth.
The cane and fabric components are easy to clean and resistant to daily wear.

products.productName: Three Seater Sofa (Cotton, Jade Ivory)
products.productDesc:
About Material & Colors

Made of premium-quality material, this 3 seater fabric sofa is sturdy in nature and offers long-lasting durability. The two fabric options available in this unit are Cotton and Velvet. Moreover, both these fabrics are available in varied colour and print options to match diverse decor aesthetics.

Manufacturing Details & Stringent Quality Checks

Our artisans ensure every minute details to achieve the extreme accuracy and level of perfection. The final product, before reaching your doorstep, the product passes through stringent quality checks. 

Product Features

Discover the peak of elegance with our Lorenz 3 Seater Sofa. This stunning piece of furniture is a testament to exquisite design and detailed craftsmanship. The soft and breathable upholstery offers a calming aura, creating a harmonious blend that soothes the senses. The tufted backrest and gracefully curved armrests add a touch of classic charm, making this sofa a timeless beauty.

Detail is where our Lorenz 3 seater sofa shines. Every stitch and line showcases the skill and dedication of the artisans who brought this masterpiece to life. The thoughtfully crafted silhouette complements any interior, making it an easy fit for both modern and traditional settings. Sink into the generously padded seats and backrests for ultimate relaxation with our Lorenz 3 Seater Sofa. Crafted with a sturdy wooden frame, this sofa promises both durability and luxury, adding a touch of sophistication to your home for years to come.

products.productName: Three Seater Curved Sofa (Cotton, Jade Ivory)
products.productDesc:
The Osbert 3 Seater Curved Sofa is a striking blend of style, comfort, and durability. Its gracefully curved silhouette makes it a statement piece in any living room, while the Jade Ivory cotton upholstery adds a soft, neutral elegance that pairs beautifully with modern and classic interiors alike. Designed with plush cushioning and a supportive frame, this sofa offers generous seating for three, making it perfect for family gatherings, cozy evenings, or entertaining guests. With its timeless design and premium build, the Osbert Sofa is as practical as it is beautiful.

Key Features:

Distinctive Curved Design: Smooth, flowing silhouette that adds sophistication and stands out as a focal point in your living space.

Premium Cotton Upholstery: Breathable, skin-friendly Jade Ivory fabric that combines comfort with understated elegance.

Spacious 3-Seater Comfort: Wide seating area designed to accommodate up to three people with ease.

Plush Cushion Support: Deep, well-padded seat and back cushions provide superior comfort and relaxation.

Sturdy Frame Build: Strong internal structure ensures lasting durability and stability for everyday use.

Neutral & Versatile Style: Jade Ivory shade blends effortlessly with both light and bold décor themes.

Perfect for Modern Homes: A stylish centerpiece ideal for living rooms, lounges, or entertainment spaces.

Precision-ventilated structure enhances airflow for a cooler, fresher, and more breathable sleep experience.

Ideal for spinal alignment in all sleeping positions.

Regulates temperature and wicks moisture for a cool, fresh sleep.

Anti-Skid Base Cover:

Premium anti-skid dotted fabric keeps the mattress securely in place, ensuring stability.

Made with high-quality materials for durability and long-lasting performance.

products.productName: Textured Anti Skid Yoga Mat (Blue)
products.productDesc:
Secure Grip & Anti-Skid Surface: The textured finish ensures superior traction and prevents slipping, even during sweaty, dynamic movements. Stay grounded and centered in every pose.

Optimal Thickness & Comfort: At 4 mm thickness, the mat offers just the right cushion — soft enough to protect your joints, yet firm enough to maintain balance and connection with the floor. 
Wooden Street

Generous Dimensions: Measuring 55″ × 22″ (≈ 139.7 cm × 55.9 cm), this yoga mat gives you plenty of space to stretch out fully. 
Wooden Street

Durable Rubber Material: Crafted from high-quality rubber, it’s designed to endure regular use without losing shape or grip. Great resistance to wear and tear. 
Wooden Street

Visually Calming Colour: The soothing shade of blue adds a serene touch to your practice space, helping promote calmness and focus.

Lightweight & Portable: Despite its robust structure, it rolls up easily and is ideal for both home use or carrying to class.

Value & Affordability: Priced significantly below its original rate, this yoga mat delivers excellent value for long-term use.

products.productName: Textured Anti Skid Yoga Mat (Black)
products.productDesc:
Material & Grip	Made from durable rubber, this mat features a finely textured surface for superior grip. Whether you're moving through flows or holding balance poses, it resists slipping even when sweaty. 
Wooden Street
Size & Comfort	Generous dimensions of 55″ × 22″ (≈ 139.7 cm × 55.9 cm) give you plenty of room to stretch out fully. At 4 mm thickness, it offers just the right cushioning—not too thin to be harsh on joints, yet firm enough to stay stable. 
Wooden Street
Color & Design	Elegant black color, minimalist and versatile—easily fits into any décor or studio style. The textured finish not only enhances safety but also adds a touch of understated style. 
Wooden Street
Brand & Quality	From the HOSTA HOMES line, this mat promises reliable construction and consistent performance. 
Wooden Street
Value	Available at ₹885 (56% off from original price), this mat offers excellent balance between affordability and quality.
